member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Middleware.InvokeAppIdRewriteMiddleware
member.summary: Rewrites Dapr invoke URLs so generated controllers can handle requests regardless of app-id. Dapr preserves the /v1.0/invoke/{appId}/method/ prefix when forwarding, while our generated controllers are hardcoded to "/v1.0/invoke/bannou/method". This middleware normalizes the path to use the default app-id so routing continues to work even when sidecars run with different IDs.

member.summary: Parameterless constructor for NSwag generated clients that handle their own dependency injection.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.DaprServiceClientBase.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IServiceAppMappingResolver,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.String)
member.summary: Full constructor for manual instantiation with all dependencies.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.DaprServiceClientBase.BaseUrl
member.summary: Gets the base URL for Dapr service invocation with dynamic app-id resolution. For parameterless constructor, falls back to "bannou" app-id. Uses environment variable DAPR_HTTP_ENDPOINT if available for containerized environments.
member.remarks:
CRITICAL ARCHITECTURAL CONSTRAINT: The app-id used here ("bannou" by default) becomes part of the URL path that Dapr forwards to the target service. Dapr does NOT strip the /v1.0/invoke/{app-id}/method/ prefix - it preserves the full path.
This means all OpenAPI schemas MUST use the same app-id in their `servers` URL: servers: - url: http://localhost:3500/v1.0/invoke/bannou/method
NSwag generates controller route prefixes from this URL. If the schema uses a different app-id (e.g., "game-session"), the generated controller route won't match the path that clients send, resulting in 404 errors.
The ServiceAppMappingResolver can dynamically route to different Dapr sidecars, but the path structure (including app-id) must match what controllers expect.
See API-DESIGN.md "servers URL Constraint" section for full documentation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.DaprServiceClientBase.PrepareRequest(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.String)
member.summary: Prepares the HTTP request with proper Dapr headers and custom headers. Works with both full constructor and parameterless constructor.
